data.title: Add Relationship
data.text: John Elkann became Chairman of Fiat Chrysler Automobiles N.V. on 13 October 2014. He was appointed Chairman of Fiat S.p.A. on 21 April 2010, having served as Vice Chairman from 2004 and Director from 1997. Mr. Elkann is also Chairman and Chief Executive Officer of EXOR and Chairman of Giovanni Agnelli B.V. Born in New York in 1976, Mr. Elkann obtained a scientific baccalaureate from the Lyc√©e Victor Duruy in Paris, and graduated in Engineering from Politecnico, the Engineering University of Turin. While at university, he gained work experience in various companies of the Fiat Group in the UK and Poland (manufacturing) as well as in France (sales and marketing). He started his professional career in 2001 at General Electric as a member of the Corporate Audit Staff, with assignments in Asia, the USA and Europe. Mr. Elkann is Chairman of PartnerRe and Vice Chairman of Ferrari N.V. and of GEDI Gruppo Editoriale S.p.A.. He is also a board member of The Economist Group. Mr. Elkann is member of MoMA. He also serves as Chairman of the Giovanni Agnelli Foundation.
